message.content:
{"id": "18163", 
"title": "Bug 18163 - Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace", 
"description": "When using the 'Add Import' function in the code editor, it does not work when there is leading or trailing whitespace in the selected text. ", 
"OB": "The 'Add Import' function should work regardless of any leading or trailing whitespace in the selected text. ", 
"EB": "When I made a selection using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' and then tried to use 'Add Import', instead of importing the selected text 'Node', the function imported 'Node ' (with a trailing whitespace).", 
"SR": "The 'Add Import' function should ignore leading and trailing whitespace in the selected text and import only the desired text. This will prevent cases where the function fails to work due to the presence of whitespace within the selection."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18163', 'title': 'Bug 18163Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace', 'description': 'Bug 18163Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '"Node " instead of "Node"because I made my selection by using "Shift + Ctrl + Right". ', 'SR': 'It often happens to me that I have selected i.e. When I then useCtrl+M (Add Import) nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace withinthe selection. '}
